__e: Hitler's own people tried to kill him a few days ago.
Hitler, proclaiming that the triumph over France was the most glorious victory of all time, ordered a ten-day celebration in Germany. It doesn't make any sense, me and Andy being here.
Hitler tried to destroy us... but he didn't succeed.
Adolf Hitler and all the great German people will be with me.
But I know I look like Hitler, and I'm going to prove it right now.
We'll beat Hitler and come back.
Someone made me say Hitler is a bastard.
Hitler is probably dead, but he also might be alive.
In '31, Hitler visited the family estate and met him.
